p: Figure 1 shows the frequency of the brain tissue cysts in tested mice of each group. Based on the obtained findings, oral administration of MCEO for 3 weeks significantly decreased the mean number of T. gondii tissue cysts mice of the tested groups of Ex1 ( p < 0.05), Ex2 ( p < 0.001), and Ex3 ( p < 0.001), in comparison with the control group (C2).
